plot: Herzog takes a film crew to the island of Guadeloupe when he hears that the volcano on the island is going to erupt. Everyone has left, except for one old man who refuses to leaves. Herzog catches the eeriness of an abandoned city, with stop lights cycling over an empty intersection.   Written by  Mike Konczewski
title: La Soufrière - Warten auf eine unausweichliche Katastrophe
